main.math

Enum ActivationFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ActivationFunction>
      • main.math.ActivationFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ActivationFunction>

    public enum ActivationFunction
extends java.lang.Enum<ActivationFunction>
    Each ActivationFunction provides the execute and derivative methods, which return respectively the output of the function and of the its derivative. To add a new ActivationFunction just create a new entry in the enum and implement the two methods.
